text: I like this music, and I wish they would bring this game over, either in hard copy or digital download, as I think this game would be VERY well received.  I see many people posting that it's because they think it wouldn't do well or they just hate America.  I think the real reason is because of legals.  There might be some copyright issues involved that they might not want to deal with, since our society is so litigious and will sue for just about anything.

text: I wonder, Tatsunoko VS Capcom was almost declined because of the Japan to World transfer, but it had massive fan reception so it got transferred. This has massive fan reception, yet still nothing. And at least Namco is already a world wide company unlike Tatsunoko whom is almost solely Japan, so what gives? This game would be great to be released!

text:
This was supposed to actually be pretty awesome, with the only real issue of the game being from the fact that it can take a really long time to play (a good hour or more on a single stage without saving).
